name: Mage Kanade’s Futanari Dungeon Quest
storyline: Taking up a request to hunt demons, Mage Kanade arrives at a dungeon. However, she was turned into a futanari. In order to return safely from a dungeon full of milking traps, Kanade confronts the monsters…
summary: Taking up a request to hunt demons, Mage Kanade arrives at a dungeon. However, she was turned into a futanari. In order to return safely from a dungeon full of milking traps, Kanade confronts the monsters…
